channel.title: dask on Chris Havlin
channel.description: Recent content in dask on Chris Havlin

item.title: Plotting Dask Futures
item.description: In working on some yt-dask refactoring a question came up as to whether or not we could return data from distributed dask workflows as it completes and do something with it.

item.title: Speeding up some K-means computation with dask
item.description: I recently dusted off a manuscript that’s been in the works for quite some time now related to seismic observations in the Western United States.
